items.value: %113% has discovered an abandoned mansion. It appears to be one of the oldest structure in the city. It seems to have been unoccupied for decades and we don't know exactly why it's left this way for so long. We can send him inside to investigate.
%113% returned with a small cache of Supplies.
%113% obtained a small amount of Supplies from an abandoned mansion.
%113% discovered an ancient Mana Orb. We have drained it of all its Mana.
%113% obtained a small amount of Mana from an abandoned mansion.
%113% has not returned. We can only assume the worst.
%113% disappeared while exploring an abandoned mansion.
%113% encountered some ancient wights while exploring the mansion. They have apparently been haunting the place for quite some time now. %113% managed to flee the place after a rather tough battle.
%113% gained a significant amount of experience from fighting ancient wights inside an abandoned mansion.
We left the abandoned mansion alone.
We left the abandoned mansion alone.
